scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../ && cd ../ && cd part2/phonebook && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../part3/phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy: git config --global user.email 'your-email@example.com' && git config --global user.name 'Your Name' && npm run build:ui && cd ../../part3/phonebook-backend && npm install --include=dev && git diff --quiet || (git add . && git commit -m 'uibuild' && git push origin main)
